data.zero: Find out more about Coke Zero

data.text: This is a small demo of the gallery. A larger gallery can be found under the gallery tab or by clicking the gallery title
data.title: Welcome to the Gallery

data.camera: These are some buttons that will change the view to a different camera. There are some extra options in the dropdown.
data.animation: These are where animations would be triggered upon implementation
data.render: These are some settings for changing the render and lighting. There are buttons for each of the lights as well as a dropdown to toggle the type of render
data.nav: These are some button to switch between the different types of navigation available

data.text: This website is an exploration into the design and styles of different coca cola branded soft drinks. There are some models that can be manipulated to view at any angle and at different lightings etc.
